content.detailedDescription: Witnesseswere riding back to austin after the austin/rochester high school football game.As they drove west on interstate 90, they began to notice cars pulled off on theshoulder of the road with their lights out.  as they continued on, they saw alight over the highway ahead.  as they drew close, they saw that it was oval insilhouette with three lights and a dome.  they were in communication with afriend via ham radio at this time.  they drove directly under the object.  theirham friend said that if they were out of contact, it was for a very short timeperiod.  after they went further down the road, they decided to go back foranother look. they turned around and went back but the object was gone.
content.summary: Two youth sight oval object with lites at night ov

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv and i closed my eyes and in front of me appaered to things andone little one i couldnt move or talk and then tey left
content.summary: They just looked at me in my bed and left i couldn

content.detailedDescription: Silver orb traveling north just north of fremont peak. saw it for three or foursecond, object faded and then shot south west upward and out of sight.

1. outside my house looking up at the stars with my girlfriend.2. the movement, formation, distance, and the fact that there were no strobes3. planes4. cant be a plane, compared to actual plane flying nearby, too high, too fast,in formation, and they disapeared.5. they flew steady, i think north, i have to look at a star chart. then theyjust dimmed and disapeared. they were really bright to begin with. i was verycarful to not blink.6. they just faded and disapeared as they continued to move accross the sky.  itwas the damnest thing
content.summary: Triangle formation in a steady north direction dis

content.detailedDescription: We went to observe comet from foothills in n phoenix and on the way back weobserved object over south mountain many miles away and it was huge. it lookedlike  a very large building with the lights on about 20-30 miles away except itwas above the mountain in the air. i would say it was twice the size of 6-7stories of a skyscraper that could also be seen downtown approx. same distance.Then noticed some of the lights were going off and on. it just hovered, slowlydescending.We saw it off and on for about 5 minutes until we got into the flatsof the valley. we then went to a church parking lot open area to see if we couldsee it but it was gone.I could barely tell that it had a frame of some sortsupporting the lights but we were just to far away to tell much about it.Theentire object was rigid  frame and lights during the observation. ive been ametar observer in the past and have worked on a army test range usaypgand cannotcompare it to any air vehicle ive ever seen.
content.summary: Mass of lights around south mountain in phoenix,az

content.detailedDescription: Notice bright light in sky.  could not identify with binoculars so video tapedobject.  the next night a second person witnessed the same object. this objectappeared to have a dome at the bottom middle with a round hole in the centrethat changed from black to white.  there was also a round greenish object thatappeared to cross the reflective bottom part. this object moved around atrandom. i stopped video tapeing and came back in the house.  the next night atabout the same location a second person witnessed this same object at about thesame location.
content.summary: Tumbler ridge b.C. ufo sighting april 28,  2004

content.detailedDescription: While sitting on the shore of lake michigan, just talking and observing the waves. a transparent red orb shaped object descended from the clouds slowly and began to move nw towards chicago, il. within 8-10 seconds it went direclty back into the clouds, and was gone. it was very transparent, and very dim. our sighting of the object was very clear, and it did not appear to be moving any faster than 20 mph. also, the object was seen on the edge of what appeared to be a string of clouds. the sky was entirely clear to the nw.
We wore have a bbq and a big flash apered

My father and uncle took me along on an evening fishing trip. i have clearmemories of this evening...Even to the clothes i was wearing. i remember i satin the ashes of a previous campfire and my father told me that my mom was goingto spank me for ruining my clothes.We were sitting on the river bank with my father on my right side and my uncleon my left. my uncle had a clear space on his left, but my father had a largetree oak on his right. it was leaning out over the water as river-bank trees arewont to do. as a result of this every so often, my fathers line would snag inthe overhanging tree branches. he would curse and reel the line back in.Although there were trees to the sides of our spot, there were none directlyover head.My father had just cast his line and it must have snagged a tree branch, becausesomething made him look up. i felt him go very still. he nudged me and said k.,look up. i looked up and directly over our heads was a very large flying saucer.It looked as big as a house....Bigger. i could see that it was bigger than therelative size of the large tree beside my father...Even at the height it was at.Which seemed to be not much higher than the tree top.The sky was black and there was no moon that i recall or could see, but i couldsee this object very clearly. obviously it was round. it had 6 round whitelights on the bottom. 5 surrounding one, all the same size, and the 5 rotatedcounter-clockwise. it was dead silent. it was a silvery pewter color. not shiny,and as i recall with....Seams in the metal. in other words, it was not aperfectly smooth skin. i knew i was seeing something extrodinary, but i wasntthe least bit frightened. we watched it as it crossed the river. as it got abouthalf way across, i saw that it was a shallow dome, like a lens. but instead of asmooth top, it had a little bump on top. a true dome that sat in the center ofthe ship. one the right upper side of the dome was a white light. the color ofan incandescent light bulb. in contrast to the lights on the bottom which lookedmore bluish and did not shine like a light.It crossed the river slowly and moved on a little further. then it hovered forjust a moment. then it just dropped slowly into the woods. i looked at myfather. he was still looking across the river. i guess they figured that theywere far enough away, because as i recall
content.summary: Close up, detailed, long viewing time

content.detailedDescription: I was reclining on a sun lounge, in the backyard of a friends house witness 2looking directly up for about 30 mins. i was staring up and directly in my viewdropped an object, i noticed it straight away. i thought the object wassuspicious because of the way that it just dropped into view. the object droppedin, and paused, then moved quickly west to east, slowed down and jolted southeast. it throbbed in size i dont know whether it was an abrupt altitude changeor the actual obect changed in size. when later viewing the digital video, theobject, between two digital frames , moved from one point to anotherinstantaniously. there were tree leaves in the way that the object moved behind,and i was able to use them as a point of reference to judge the instant jump. ilost sight of the object when it moved into a cloud and into the way of the sun.We also needed an extension cord for the camera because the battery was flat andwe had to run it off the mains.
content.summary: Object dropped from above and displayed unconventi

content.detailedDescription: I came home late one night and was locked out so i layed down on the porch itwas around 3 or 4 oclock at night. i was lying on my back and saw a light gostraight across the sky it was really high in the air. when i saw it i wasthinking i cant believe what im seeing. could it be. no it cant be. well maybeit is. i jumped to my feet and i was just stairing at it. after it was gone istarted thinking to myself and i started thinking that i was possible that iseen a ufo but then i started thinking of all of the other things it could havebeen. i thought it might be a jet or maybe a satelite rotating the earth. theobject just few in a straight line the light would dimm it would never gocompletely out but it would really dimm. it few out of sight it didnt reallydisappear i dont think. i just flew out of sight. it was to far away. it wasmoving really fast.

We were home havibg dinner on the deck.My husband was facing opposite us. hesaid he saw a ufo above us. i didnt believe it and thought he was kidding. mynephew got up and turned around saying that i had better turn around. i did, andwas stunned - it was a glowing orange object above the tree in our neighborsyard but a distance away . as i looked it appeared to be stopped and thengetting larger. i feared it was coming in closer. it almost appeared to bedayglow - extrewmely bright. i backed off and my nepphew jumped over the deckonto a golf course as it began to slowly move. it then shot across the sky anddissappeared. i have not been able to find another report of a sighting in thisarea  since then. i know it was something very unusual as it seemed static,glowed unbelievably and appeared to move towards us and then to the right.

I was walking along a rural road with my nephew looking for pieces of wood tomake xmas gifts. i noticed what i thought was a bright star in the skyin thesouth and pointed it out to him, saying look at that bright star,maybe its thesame xmas star that appeared when jesus was born. we walked back to our housebecause it had gooten dark outside. i noticed that the light had moved from itsposition in the sky, and was now in the western sky. it was hovering over afield, which was behind our house. i told jeremy that i was going to goinvestigate it,since we had seen lights and strange shaped crafts in the samearea before.  jeremy decided he wanted to come along, and my moms dog followedus.To get to the field,we had to walk up a wooded hill,which was a few hundredfeet up and then we entered the field, which was covered in snow. the weatherwas very cold,but the sky was clear. the light was hovering above the treetopson the opposite end of the field.All of the dogs in the neighborhood werebarking.As we stood staring at the light,it began to turn color,and became apurple colorlike the color of a florescent blacklight.It also grew in size. thenthe light started changing shape,as if it was morphing.Two of the shapes iremember was a five pointed star,and a pyramid.These shapes were not solid,butwere 3 dimensional grids,and seemed to be made of a laser light-and was alsopurple.Then the light shaped itself back into a ball, and a purple light beganto surround us.At first it was just around us,but soon it covered the wholefield. we were looking at this, and i noticed other lights in the sky. thesewere smaller red lights that blinked.They were also hovering above the field,butwere surrounding the area.There were 3-4 of these.When i looked back at thepurple globe,i saw what appeared to be people standing on top of it they weremoving about, and waving.I asked jeremy if he saw what i did, and he said thathe saw people waving at us too.There were about 4-5 figures.Then one of thefigures broke away from the globe and its occupants, and began floating slowlydown toward us. our dog ran and hid in the woods,and my nephew was gettingfrightend. i told him if they were going to abduct us, i would volunteer, and heshould run and hide. the entity came to rest directly in front of us,about 2-3feet away. it was shaped like a huma

My husband and i were driving home on a friday evening at approximately 8:30 p.M. i believe it was april 16, 2004, but i cannot be positive that it was not the friday before.  we live in howard county, indiana and are very close to cass county, indiana.  we were on county road 425 north, when almost at the same time, we both said, "what is that?"  we observed 3-4 red lights equal distance apart in the form of a triangle or diamond shape.  we could only see the lights.  we could not see the object, in fact, it was just very dark in what would be the center of the lights.  the lights suddenly disappeared as if someone had turned off a switch.  it was very low.  it appeared to only be hovering, not really moving.  once the lights went out, we could not see it.  we continued driving and approximately a half-mile down the road, we saw it again hovering in a cornfield.  very low and close to us.  again, after a few seconds, the lights turned off again and we could not see anything.  we were both in awe.  i was scared. my husband, a former police officer and pilot, said he had never seen anything like it.  we both believe it was a ufo.  we told our family and a few close friends.  i just learned through the pharos-tribune that there were sightings in rochester, indiana also in april.
content.summary: Saw lights hovering low which turned off -- two lo

content.detailedDescription: I hope we did not leave anything out on this form that would diswade yourorginization from investigating our sighting.I have proof i was out on my patioto smoke a cigarette and was looking up at the night sky as i always do and atfirst i thought i was experiencing auto-kenesis of a star. then the movementbecame so obvious that there was no doubt about what i was seeing. i opened thedoor and screamed for my girlfriend to come out immediately and witness thesighting with me. for years i had been telling her about a sighting i had tenyears ago with another witness at the time and out of love she always wanted tobelieve me but, you know how it goes. . .If you havent seen it for yourself,live, then you can never truely, truely 100 per cent believe. lets see, adescription of how the ufo behaved last night - you know how the bugs you seethat hover over your lawn and are lit up in the summer sunlight move the ufoflew in a more lazy version of that.Zipping, speeding up and slowing down whilemoving in any one direction. long, sudden, shallowdownward arc movements to theright heading north seemed to be a favorite with this object and did it at least5 different times.Both sharper and smoother abrupt turns. dips and ascensions,etc. yet all was liquid smooth flight - totally defying the laws of gravity -very exciting so exciting that we both got tension headaches from experiencingthe event. bakersfield was very windy from early evening on and picked up somefarm dust into the atmosphere. the sighting lasted so long that the only reasonwe went in was becasue the ufo eventually made its way further and further fromus and the dusty atmosphere eventually blocked most of the object and it becamea dim pin point. but when we went back inside the end of a 45 minute duration,you could still barely see it and it was still doing its thing. i went backoutside a half hour later and both the ufo and oddly enough the mighty winds wewere having were gone. please, dont take my word for it. if you decide to sendsomeone to investigat our sighting report they can come out onto my balcony andwith my compass get exact sighting info. and after that they can sit down andwatch the sighting on my large screen tv as i recorded about  15 minutes of iton

Was closing the gate to our yard when i noticed immediately a very brightlightin the nw part of sky. it was stationary and looked like no star or planet iveever seen. upon closer observation it seemed it could be two lights side byside. it seemed to glare like a star would, but seemed to close to be one, hencethe brightness. ive seen bright planets and stars in the sky before, but nothingever this bright. it seemed to move slowly across the northern sky and closer tothe horizon over about a half hour period. it was still visible when we went tobed at 1045.
content.summary: Saw very bright stationary lights in the sky at ni

content.detailedDescription: My father was a military pilot stationed at fuchu afb on the outskirts of tokyo,japan. the miltary families stationed in the area lived in a housing complexcalled kanto mura located a few miles from fuchu afb. it was late afternoon inthe summer of 1967. myself and 2 friends were standing talking outside the 4plex in which my family resided. it was that time of day when the sun is gettinglow on the hoizon, bathing everything in bright golden light.I was facing north toward mt. fujiyama. some movement to my right east caught myeye. looking in that direction, i saw a saucer shaped craft slowly risingstraight up into the air. it appeared to be rising from the fields and openareas outside the base in that direction. there was no apparent means ofpropulsion. after rising to i would estimate to be about 100-500 feet, it cameto a complete stop. at this point, i had called it to the attention of myfriends.As we watched, the saucer suddenly moved west in a straight line at a high, evenrate of speed and at the same altitude. it suddenly stopped nearly directly infront of us still with no change in altitude. it looked much bigger than a golfball but not as large as a basketball. regarding its angle to the horizon, itwas not directly above us, but about 34 of the way from the horizon to directlyoverhead.The surface was highly reflective like aluminum. the craft appeared to be goldenbecause of the strong late afternoon light. as the saucer remained stationary,it could be seen rotating due to the strong light on it. in appearance, theshape was like 2 deep saucers or round-bottomed bowls put together with a domeon the top. in dimensions, it was wider than it was tall.After watching the object for what seemed like a couple of minutes, it suddenlyshot to the north at a high rate of speed and was soon out of sight. regardingmy emotions, i was just excited about it-during and after the event. there wereno peculiar emotions connected to the event.I remember the names of the other 2 witnesses but am hesitant to include them inthis report. they may not want to be contacted about it after all these years.One of them later joined the military and i dont know happened to the other.
content.summary: Close daylight sighting. kanto mura, tokyo, japan

content.detailedDescription: On april 25, 2004 me and my mom went to the river to take pics of it since it was flooded. we walked under the bridge toward the other part of the river where the restrooms are. i then took a few pics of the river. it was a very clear day, wind was blowing but not that hard. i walked up to the restrooms and saw a small field, and in the background, the mountain hills. i love the outdoors, so i took a picture. well, then i noticed i had gotten the cement in the pic, so i stepped to my right side and took another pic. after i took that pic we decide to head back to the car. well, i took some more pics, then we left. i got home and started to download them to my computer. when i got to the field pictures, i noticed a black rectangle in the picture under the one cloud in the sky. that was the first picture i had taken of the field, so i was like - ok, a spot on my camera lens. well, i then opened the second picture of the field, and it was clear as a bell - no spot on the picture from what i could tell. i then showed my parents and asked them what they thought, and they didn't know what it could be, so here i am writing to you about it. i do hope you can help me. thank you for your time.

Me and my best friend went to the school at night to run the football field toexercise.My friend was laying on the trunk of my car resting after a run.I wasinside the car turning on the radio . all of a sudden my friend said what arethoseup out of the drainage creek came 3 large humanoid almost robot likefigures about 7ft tall.One was carrying a case that looked like steel.

1. driving home from columbus, ga2. looking at the stars and then spotted the object3. a helicopter from fort benning, then as we got closer, it resemble a stealthbomber -- triange shape.4. slowed down and let down the windows, there was no noise coming from it. witness 2 said, mama, that is no airplane, lets get out of here and then shedcalled home to tell dad.   witness 1 has encounter this object on otheroccasions with oldest daughter, but has never reported it before.  they havealso on the other occassions seen light balls bouncing up and down out of thewoods and then disappearing in the horizon.  these sighting usually occur innovember and december late at night.5.  hovering triangle with a spotlight, blinking lights under the rear point,red, maybe green.  blue light under each wing.6.  drove away.

I would not like my name to be published, but i would like to be contacted if itis helpful to your investigation, or if you can shed some light on what iobserved. it is easiest to reach me by email at the email address above.This observation took place on saturday march 27, 2004 at approx. 4.25pm, andcontinued for about 30- 40 minutes. the sky was partly cloudy w scatteredcumulus clouds and it was an otherwise bright and sunny spring day. i had takena tire to be fixed at the wood and fullerton goodyear tire store at 2465 townlake parkway in woodstock ga.  this is near my home and is in an area with lotsof  businesses. as they worked on my tire, i went outside to enjoy the springweather.  i was looking up at the sky and happened to see the object. what iobserved, to the north and east, was a slient, metallic, spherical objecthovering, seemingly at an altitude slightly above the cloud tops in the distant.It is difficult to estimate its distance and size as there were no easyreference points. the object was silent and motionless. i observed it forseveral minutes and it may have drifted slightly.  it was finally covered by alarge cloud. as i tried to observe it again, and after about 5-10 minutes sinceit had disapppeared behind the cloud, i observed another, identical object tothe east but still nearby to where i had seen the first object.  it took had thesame characteristics as the first object, and might even have been the firstobject.  i observed it too for several minutes with clouds occasionally andtemporarily covering it as they passed.  this entire observation was a half houror more.  the objects were metallic and silent.  the closest conventional objecti could relate them to would be a ballon.  unlike ballons ive seen, theseobjects seemed to be almost motionless, possibly drifting very slightly. thefact that clouds drifted by made it difficult for me to discern if the objectsever really moved very much.  this motionlessness seemed odd to me. no othersseemed to notice the objects,  though in fairness, to do so one would have tohave looked at that particular part of the sky to see the objects.  i haveexcellent distant vision and happened to first notice the first object when iwas looking up at the beautiful spring sky. during the observation i noticed 3-4jet aircraft at much higher altitudes than the object, and one small privateplan travelling to the east at about the same apparent altitude as the secondobject, but not near the object. after about 30-40 mins. i went inside the storeas my tire was ready. i was struck by this event enough to mention to the storemanager that there was some interesting arial

This is going to be slightly difficult because its been an ongoing thing foralmost 4 months now.  it began in february of 2004.  a friend of mine kepttelling me about a planet in the night sky that would appear after hours afterthe sun set and would disappear around 1000 p.M.  i started to take numerousphotographs and from that point on i have seen so many sightings that i canteven remember all the craft and different scenarios ive seen.  my occurrence isdaily.  i feel like since i have seen these craft and have some spectacularphotographs i have either gotten their attention or have irriteted them or both. either way i am considering myself on the surveillance list of whoever pilotthese craft i have observed.  to date there have been no abductions or contact. they do follow me everywhere i go and even have followed me out of the state ofnevada.  i have photographs of what should be an airplane but when the photocomes back its a disc projecting a hologram. since i have photos like this i amwondering if they feel threatened that in some way i have blown their cover. the only thing is that when i go to film them they for some reason do not havethe ability to cloak like they would like which leaves them vulnerable tophotographs.  i have aquired quite an arsenal of photos and information based onwhat i have observed.  i have photos i have enhanced to see what is there butthey are also in original form so they can be analyzed.
content.summary: My name is sk and im witnessing ufos daily in las

content.detailedDescription: Hello, ill tell what happened as best as i can rememberive forgotten somethings,incredible but true. the events ocurred in 1994,i believe. i dontremember the days but it was around 7 something or 8 something pmat night. i wasin my houses terrace lifting some weights when i saw the saucer. i live near lospaseos in cupey, puerto rico. i was about 17 years old at the time.When i saw the saucer from my terrace, the saucer was above the shoppingmalllittle shopping mall of los paseos. it was about 150 feet above in the air.I immediately identified the object as a saucer because of the extreme lowaltitude, it was so close, so low. the object at that time was hovering, quietin the sky. it was gorgeous, the exact coloryellow goldlike 24 karat gold, therewere windows with colored lights, one different light per window, in all like arainbow.The saucer had a dome. some feets above and around the dome,the sky was orange,almost like a painting. i dont know if that was radiation or some light orwhatever it was, but was like that. i dont think it was a hologram. in thebottom of the craft i saw two louversblackones from my viewpoint so i dont knowif there were more. i looked at the saucer for about 1 to 2 minutes, then iwalked some steps back  toward the house to call my mom, to tell her to come tothe terrace to watch the saucer, but she didnt hear me so i came back to look atthe saucer again but it was gone.P.S3e in those days in that area i saw 3 ufos. one very high in the sky that cametwo or three consecutive days around 515 pm or something like that, hovered, ithide itself between the clouds, made backward movements like it knew that wemyfather,mother,and me were watching him, like playing with us.Some days or weeks later i was again in the terrace and looked at the horizonand saw a saucer ascent from the ground i think and move to the right. thedistant i would say some miles my house is in hills, so i have a good view.The color of the saucer from that distance was orange, or a reddish-orange.And my third and last view of a saucer those days was the first one that idescribed already at the beginni
content.summary: Ufos over san juan, puerto rico nearly at ground l

content.detailedDescription: 1. cooking bacon in microwave in a kitchen on the east side of the house.2. lights dimmed and brightened and the telephone began ringing in an unusualway.3. light was coming in window, but i thought that it was the moon at first.4. the object was hovering, then moved south within a minute or so.5. about 10 minutes after the object left, two dark colored helicopter passedoverhead from north to south.  this is very unusual for vernon.
content.summary: Light in sky with electrical disruption

content.detailedDescription: At 845 p.M. me and a friend were in the backyard looking at the moon and venusas they were aligned tonight. we first saw the object moving very quickly acrossthe sky heading north. it looked like 4 very dim slightly pink steady lightsarranged in a triangular formation with one light in the middle. it passedoverhead and then disappeared as if the lights just turned off. about 2 minuteslater we saw a v shaped arrangement of lights, also very dim, fly low and veryquickly overhead. about 5 minutes later another v shaped craft flew quicklyoverhead and then disappeared. about 5 minutes after that a large dimly lit grayball quickly bounced across the sky and then vanished. about 3-5 minutes afterthat a solid straight line of 3 dim lights went racing overhead while spinningon it60s axis. all these lights were heading in the same direction which was north.But about 5 minutes later 3 dim lights in a triangular formation went flyingoverhead at an amazing speed and then proceeded to break apartspread out andseperate but then quickly regroup into a triangle and then disappear from sight.In all 6 cases the lights were clearly visible as there was no cloudcoverfogwind or light pollution the stars were very clear and plentiful which israre around the bay areaeven though the all the lights on each craft were verydim. they all blended in with the stars and did not flash or blink. in each casethere was no sound at all. the oakland airport is close by and airplane noise isvery familiar. all the craft observed moved about as 34 the speed of ameteorite. all of the objects observed seemed to just disappear from view asthey passed overhead.I and several other witnesses saw 6 different craft displaying completelyunusual behavior within one hours time. each craft was different except for 2were v shaped. the first craft was triangular shaped with a light in the middle,the next 2 were v shaped, the 4th one was straight like a stick and the 6thcraft was in a triangle formation but broke apart and then regrouped quickly.

At the beach smoking with associates lying on back and object flying westwardfrom east flew by out of sight then came back opposite direction then changeddirection to north east. noticed object as it was traveling fast and was bright.Lost sight as it was out of range

I was at the park alone, i noted that the sky and the sunset were looking prettygood and that i should take a picture of it, so i took out my cam and started totake pics to the sunset while walking and feeding the ducks. when i got to myhouse and connected the cam to the computer to see the pictures, i saw in 3pictures of the sunset a black thing in the middle of the sun and i couldntexplain that because the other pictures came out pretty good. well i just wantedto show somebody, maybe i am wrong ans its only a defect of the cam. if somebodyis interesting in take a look at the pics just email me, thank you.

I was sitting in my hot tub looking at, what i preceived to be, jupiter orvenus,  about 845pm. it was partly cloudy and the planets kept disappearing andreappearing through the clouds. as i was looking at the sky, i noticed 3 brightwhite triangles moving across the sky. one in the lead and the other twoflanking either side of the first. at first glance,  i thought it was birds, butid never seen birds flying so late at night and in such unison without faulter.As they disappeared into the clouds, i saw two more white triangles fall fromthe sky horizontally, parallel to eachother to the ne. then, disappeared behindthe clouds.
In bed. i was looking out the window so id see it anyway. a ufo. just watched itin amazement. flying crooked making a shhhh sound. it went behind the trees.

There was a sudden pause in between moments and the air craft had hovered aboveme, i saw what have been an electromagnetic field that was quite enormous as ifit were heat rising from the ground on a hot day coming from the spaceship andall metal underneath the ship was crushed to a pulp and large indentations wereput into the ground afterwards
